Name: Seated Statuette of the God Anubis
Description: This statuette shows Anubis, the protector god of the underworld, in a seated position. His eyes are inlaid with silver or electrum. His left arm is slightly raised; the right hand rests on his knees. There are traces of greenish color between the legs of the statuette. Hieroglyphic inscriptions are engraved around the base of the statue.
